title: The One With All The Rugby

questions.question: What is Chandler doing at the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation: Chandler is getting a petticure, which is a form of manicure for men, at a beauty parlour.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman who walks into the beauty parlour where Rachel and Chandler are?
questions.explanation: Janice walks into the beauty parlour where Rachel and Chandler are, and her presence is announced by her loud and distinctive laugh.

questions.question: Why does Ross agree to play rugby?
questions.explanation: Ross agrees to play rugby to prove his toughness to Emily, who thinks it's hilarious that he would play the sport.

questions.question: What is the name of the park where the rugby game is being played?
questions.explanation: The rugby game is being played at Riverside Park, as mentioned by Devon when he invites Ross to play.

questions.question: What is the reason for Chandler's 'pre-emptive strike' against Janice?
options: He wants to break up with her
questions.correct_answer: He wants to break up with her
questions.explanation: Chandler wants to break up with Janice before they get too involved, so he comes up with a plan to tell her he's being transferred to Yemen.

questions.question: What does Monica use to try and figure out what the light switch does?
questions.explanation: Monica plugs in various electronics that make noise into the outlets controlled by the mystery switch, so she can follow the sound and determine which outlet is connected to the switch.

questions.question: What is the name of the country Chandler claims he is being transferred to?
questions.explanation: Chandler tells Janice that he is being transferred to Yemen as a way to get rid of her.

questions.question: What is Ross's strategy for playing rugby?
options: To stay away from the ball
questions.explanation: Ross decides to go 'Red Ross', which means to play aggressively and with intensity, in order to prove himself in the rugby game.

questions.question: What is the name of the woman who is revealed to be living in the apartment below Monica and Rachel's?
questions.explanation: Mrs. Chatracus is the woman who is revealed to be living in the apartment below Monica and Rachel's, and is discovered when Rachel removes a paper covering a hole in the floor.

questions.question: What does Emily tell Ross about the opposing team's players?
options: That they are all very weak
That they are all very strong
That one of them has a weak ankle
questions.correct_answer: That one of them has a weak ankle
questions.explanation: Emily tells Ross that one of the opposing team's players, Devon, has a weak ankle, and that Ross can use this to his advantage in the game.

questions.question: What is the final outcome of Chandler's attempt to get rid of Janice?
options: He successfully gets rid of her
She finds out about his plan and gets angry
He decides to stay with her
She decides to go to Yemen with him
questions.correct_answer: She finds out about his plan and gets angry
questions.explanation: Janice finds out about Chandler's plan to pretend to leave for Yemen and gets angry, but the exact outcome is not fully resolved in the episode transcript.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's injuries after the rugby game?
options: He was tackled by the opposing team
He was hit by a ball
He got into a fight with someone
questions.correct_answer: He was tackled by the opposing team
questions.explanation: Ross is injured after the rugby game because he was tackled by the opposing team, and he suffers various injuries including a black eye and bruises.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say to Ross after the rugby game?
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Ross that he should see a doctor after the rugby game, due to the severity of his injuries.

questions.question: What is the name of the airline that Chandler is supposed to be flying with to Yemen?
questions.explanation: The airline that Chandler is supposed to be flying with to Yemen is the Yemen Express, as announced over the airport's public address system.

questions.question: What does Janice say she will do while Chandler is away in Yemen?
options: She will start dating someone else
She will move to a new city
questions.explanation: Janice tells Chandler that she will wait for him while he is away in Yemen, and that she will write to him every day.

questions.question: What is the result of Monica's investigation into the mystery switch?
options: She discovers that it controls the lights
She discovers that it controls the outlets
She discovers that it is connected to a wire that disappears behind the baseboard
She discovers that it is not connected to anything
questions.correct_answer: She discovers that it is connected to a wire that disappears behind the baseboard
questions.explanation: Monica's investigation into the mystery switch reveals that it is connected to a wire that disappears behind the baseboard, but she is unable to determine what it actually controls.

questions.question: What does Ross say to Emily after the rugby game?
options: I'm sorry I didn't play better
I'm glad I got to meet your friends
questions.explanation: Ross tells Emily that he had a great time playing rugby, despite getting injured, and that he enjoyed the experience.

questions.question: What does Joey say to Ross after the rugby game?
options: If you go back out there, you'll be Dead Ross
questions.correct_answer: If you go back out there, you'll be Dead Ross
questions.explanation: Joey tells Ross that if he goes back out onto the field, he'll be 'Dead Ross', implying that he will get seriously hurt.

questions.question: What does Emily do to help Ross during the rugby game?
options: She gives him advice on how to play
She cheers him on from the sidelines
She tells him about the opposing team's weaknesses
questions.correct_answer: She tells him about the opposing team's weaknesses
questions.explanation: Emily tells Ross about the opposing team's weaknesses, including Devon's weak ankle and Liam's bad knees, to help him gain an advantage in the game.

questions.question: What is the outcome of Chandler's attempt to get a fake ticket to Yemen?
options: He successfully gets a fake ticket
He is unable to get a fake ticket
He decides not to try to get a fake ticket
He gets a real ticket to Yemen
questions.correct_answer: He is unable to get a fake ticket
questions.explanation: Chandler is unable to get a fake ticket to Yemen, as the ticket agent does not understand what he is asking for and instead tries to sell him a real ticket.
